title: RBI holds interest rates, with no hint of rate cuts
description:
The repo rate, which is the pivotal rate to the RBI’s signalling of rates across the system, stands at 6.5 percent.

The six wise men and women comprising the monetary policy committee (MPC) of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) meet once every two months to decide on interest rates prevailing in our c...

title: RBI Monetary Policy Committee meet: Date, time and what to expect
description: RBI Monetary Policy meet: The Reserve Bank of India's Monetary Policy Committee (RBI MPC) begins its three-day deliberations today in Mumbai- the first such meeting after the announcement of the Interim Budget by Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman.
